Desc.entry: Standard disabled toilets do not meet the needs of all people with a disability, or their carers. Changing Places Toilet facilities include a height adjustable, adult-sized, changing bench, a tracking hoist system or mobile hoist (users must provide their own sling), adequate space in the changing area for a disabled person and two carers, an accessible toilet, non-slip floor and waste disposal facilities. A Mobile Changing Places toilet is also available for hire at large and small events (please contact for further details). Changing Places Toilet locations, opening times and access requirements are listed below and on www.signpostsheffield.org.uk. To obtain a Radar Key to access Changing Places toilets or for more information on Radar Keys please see separate entry or visit http://www.radar.org.uk/radarwebsite/.

ContactName.entry: Jane Hobson (Development Manager)/Josie Bolland (Complex Health Needs Manager)
